评论详情: I like the quality of the shoe. It feels good. It has the support for my feet for a great price. I'm a size 8 in women but for me these ran small and I struggled to get them on. But they were definitely comfortable and I wish they had a size 9 .
Nice shoes

These are sturdy and comfortable. Reason for the lower star rating is two-fold. The heel is very stiff which makes them hard to get on. The laces are long and don’t stay tied very well. However, I have flexibility issues in my knees and can’t bend down to put these on and keep them tied. So if you are more “bendy” than I am, you might love these. I’m keeping them in my car for extra shoes in case my regular ones are out of commission.

评论概述: If you have a wide foot the opening is to small to get foot into shoe.
评论详情: It was not wide enough to get foot in through the top. Width was fine after struggling to get my foot in. But can not ware with out cutting where tough should be. So opening was to small, I would not recommend it to a person with a wide foot.

When wife first tried these shoes on she thought the soles were too thin. But after leaving them on for a while they seemed comfortable. Now she wears them for as long as she wants, sometimes all day. They are comfortable for her and she likes them. She is also happy that she found a size 5 shoe that fit her, because her feet are wide.

I had a knee repair surgery two years ago and have really struggled to learn to walk again. I was on crutches for two months between the injury and surgery and then non-weight bearing for another two months. I forgot how to walk, y'all. I mean, my muscles were in a state of total amnesia. I used to wear high heels, cowboy boots and all kinds of fun shoes. I had one pair of slip-on tennis shoes that I could wear that would support my feet and not cause me to trip, as I learned to walk again. I am pretty much recovered and have few issues with walking. But there are days that my knee hurts a bit. I swim several times a week and do strength training, and on those days, my knee hurts a bit. I was advised by trainer to try barefoot shoes. I did research and, when I saw the chance to get these, I was excited. I am so glad I did. These are so easy to walk in. I don't feel the strain inside my knee when walking a lot, as I did before. I also feel less burden when I lift my feet while walking. I have heavier shoes because these were the ones that I could slip on and also had really great non-skid bottoms. I felt safer in them. And I could put them on, lol. So, moving to other shoes was scary. But I am so glad I got these. They really are easy to walk in. The soles are non-skid. And they are not so heavy. I mean, I held one of my other shoes in one hand and one of these in the other and it was so obviously different. Both of these shoes weigh less than the one shoe I usually wear. I have found less fatigue on my knees at the end of a day, and less strain on the arch. It's like walking barefoot, which really is my most comfortable way to walk. These are really awesome shoes and at more than half the price of others I looked at. I also love that I can wash them - just toss in washer and dryer and they are good to go. Love them.

These shoes are incredibly light and wide. They’re ridiculously comfy. I’m a staff nurse on an IMCU so I have up to 6 patients that require some pretty constant care so clock 15k steps at work a day usually and my hips/feet still feel amazing at the end of the day. They do look a bit like the wide toe toddler shoes but you can’t beat the functionality. They seem to be great quality also, so I think they’ll last a while

I wear a size 6.5-7 depending on the shoe style & ordered these in a 6.5 due to fact that they are “barefoot” shoes & they are a perfect fit! All of the fabric on the shoe including the tongue of the shoe are one single piece so you never have a twisted tongue or it slipping inside the shoe when your trying to put them on or any of those other factors. They fabric is breathable & the insoles are soft. I don’t have any foot issues but I can say that these would be perfect for people who have feet problems such as ingrown toenails or bunions because there’s no constricting areas inside the shoe & they are quite roomy. They are really comfortable & because how they are made in one single piece of fabric., you don’t have to tie the laces & could tuck them inside the shoe if you prefer. They are easy to slip on & off your feet but are also secured perfectly to your feet when walking. I’m quite impressed with not only the design of these but also the quality & comfort. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!

I am very happy with these - I have wide feet and it is sometimes hard to feel comfortable in sporty shoes. These are true to my size, yet wide enough for my feet. They feel extremely light and are very comfortable to walk in - would definitely order again!

I haven't had good luck with off brand tennis shoes in the past, so I usually avoid ordering them. Well, I've wanted to try the barefoot type shoes, so I figured, why not? I waited quite some time for these to arrive, and they were worth the wait! They are SO comfortable. They have a deep footbed, so I left the thick insole they came with and I inserted my own custom insole on top of that (2 layers) and that made them extra comfortable. The deep footbed is a little too deep for my comfort without the extra insole, but that is personal preference. The toebed is decently wide, and my toes do not feel squished. Lengthwise, I think the sizing is dead on. I ordered a 37. Usually my foot is right at the end of a 37 and these are no exception. My toes reach right to the end. They are a perfect fit for me! I have a narrow to normal foot and the toebed is comfortable. As I mentioned, the length is just right. If I had a wide foot, I'm not sure if these would work, but I think that is also due to the fact that I have a double layered insole in the shoe. Without two insoles, I do think the width would be more accommodating to someone with a wider foot. These shoes are seriously more comfortable than another much more expensive brand I have tried. Anyway, I'm impressed with the comfort of these, and the look is sleek and subtle as well. Can't wait to try these out for sports like lifting and running and see how they do. After giving these shoes even more of a test run, I think I will come back and order more colors! Can't go wrong with the price.
I forget I am wearing them half the time. I like them.
Great shoes, comfortable. Only problem I see is the shoe laces wont stay tied.
I normally wear a 5.5 shoe size. I got a six but it was still small. Nice shoe though - but  size up, especially if you have a high in step.
This is a great pair of shoes. Beautiful and comfy but not for me because I have a high arch and can’t be open at the top. Anybody with normal arch can enjoy because they’re really comfortable.
Roomy toe box, and wider mid foot made them more comfortable for me  and the style/design were cute. I did have to change the insoles as I needed something a bit more supportive.

评论概述: Not as wide as they claim
评论详情: They are super comfortable they really make my back and my legs feel better but they are not a 4E that's what I wear I am 101 lb 4 ft 11 they are tight on my left foot I can't wear a thick socks so I have to wear a thin socks but I absolutely love them but I want to make sure someone with wide feet knows they're just a regular wide width nothing extra nothing spectacular but they are great shoe I think the left shoe is smaller than my right shoe very disappointed about that I can't hardly get it on my left foot so FYI if you have wide feet they're not as wide as they claim them to be I am only 4 ft 11 and 101 lb and it is extremely hard to get on my left foot you cannot widen the shoe to put it on either it has no stretch
I have so much difficulty with buying shoes wide enough for my feet. These are roomy and look great on. No more painful feet after wearing them all day. A+

评论概述: I have just received these shoes.
评论详情: This order came quickly. These shoes are very comfortable and easy to slip on and off. I love the wide toe box.  Also they have decent tread on sole, should be non slip,. Very light and flexable shoe..
I like the way these feel on my feet. True to size and flexible. The only thing I don't like is that they look a bit awkward but I got mine in black so it's not really noticeable.
These are extremely comfortable. They’re lightweight. The fit feels true to size. I like that these look like “regular” sneakers so they pair well with whatever I wear.

Great in comfort a little snug getting it on since it's slide in with a shoelace to tighten it up. Wide and comfortable for my toes ..a bit too large going to order next size down Feels like walking in slippers. Good price quality for money , style goes with everything.
This shoe was very tight at the top of my foot. It did not stretch and was hard to get on.

These shoes are super comfortable and a great fit and stylish.  I have a high arch and get sore easily with uncomfortable shoes. These are breathable, and great quality. They have a wide toe box. The price was amazing and definitely better than paying hundreds of dollars for a barefoot shoe.
I like the way they feel on my feet!!!  There is plenty of room inside and I feel like I am walking on air.
For those of you with wider feet, these have lots of room and still cute. You might want some different inserts, but I do in every shoe. Cute and comfy!

评论概述: Very comfortable and true to size
评论详情: When I first got the shoes, I thought they looked too small. I was pleasantly surprised that, not only did they fit well, they allowed my feet to breathe and feel free. They're cute, too!
Comfy and love

评论概述: Comfortable, Versatile Shoes with Great Traction
评论详情: These shoes impressed me with their comfort and versatility. They have a naturally wider fit, which accommodated my feet perfectly even though I sized up half a size. Despite their relaxed look, they offer good protection and surprisingly grippy soles, making them suitable for various terrains.  Here's what I liked: - Comfy and roomy: The wider fit provided excellent comfort without sacrificing stability, even for my slightly larger feet. - Versatile style: The unassuming design complemented different outfits, making them suitable for casual and even semi-formal occasions. - Great traction: Despite the flat soles, I was surprised by the excellent grip on various surfaces, offering confident wear.  Things to consider: - Size up: While comfortable, they run slightly small. Ordering half a size bigger is recommended for a perfect fit.  Overall, these shoes are a great choice for those seeking comfort, versatility, and good traction.
Very comfortable. They are non slip and look nice. I’m on my feet for hours and these are perfect for me.

评论概述: I like the shoe it came as shown but not as comfortable as I thought it would be .
评论详情: I like the shoe but I thought the shoes would be more comfortable and they are not .
